markdownRemark.html:
I'm passionate about programming, food and cooking, and the outdoors. I believe in creating communities through technology, and I thrive when solving hard problems.

I live in Bolder, CO and love to meet new people. If you are in the city, we should grab coffee (or tea, my favorite). You can reach me at nick@nickdrane.com.

I also do consulting work for software companies and am happy to chat with you about your projects.
